title: Kindaichi Shounen no Jikenbo
alternative_title: Kindaichi Case Files, 金田一少年の事件簿
description: Kindaichi Hajime may look dumb, but he is one of the smartest detectives that you will ever see. He encounters mysteries after mysteries with his good friend, Miyuki, and he swears to solve them in the name of his grandfather, who was a great detective.
